title: Course Registration Form
description: Register for courses, workshops, and training programs

intro_text.title: Course Registration
intro_text.description: Welcome to our course registration portal. Please complete this form to register for courses, workshops, or training programs. Required fields are marked with an asterisk (*).

registration_type.description: Please select the type of program you're registering for

registration_deadline.description: Please note the registration deadline for your selected period

policies_intro.title: Policies & Agreements
policies_intro.description: Please review the following policies and agreements. You must agree to these terms to complete your registration.

cancellation_policy.title: Cancellation Policy
cancellation_policy.description: Cancellations must be submitted in writing at least 14 days before the course start date to receive a full refund. Cancellations received less than 14 days but more than 7 days before the start date will receive a 50% refund. No refunds will be issued for cancellations received less than 7 days before the start date. Substitutions may be made at any time with written notice.

attendance_policy.title: Attendance Policy
attendance_policy.description: Regular attendance is required for all courses. Students must attend at least 80% of scheduled sessions to receive credit or certification. For online courses, active participation in discussions and completion of assignments is required.

code_of_conduct.title: Code of Conduct
code_of_conduct.description: All participants are expected to behave professionally and respectfully. Harassment, discrimination, or disruptive behavior will not be tolerated and may result in removal from the course without refund.

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.description: Your personal information will be used only for course administration, communication, and institutional record-keeping. We will not share your information with third parties except as required by law or with your explicit consent.

terms_agreement.title: Terms & Conditions Agreement
terms_agreement.description: I have read and agree to the terms and conditions, including the cancellation policy, attendance policy, code of conduct, and privacy policy.

photo_release.title: Photo Release
photo_release.description: I grant permission for photographs or videos taken during the course to be used for promotional or educational purposes.

communication_consent.title: Communication Consent
communication_consent.description: I consent to receive emails, texts, or other communications related to my course registration, upcoming courses, and educational opportunities.

review_intro.title: Review Your Information
review_intro.description: Please review all the information you've provided before submitting your registration. You can go back to previous sections to make changes if needed.

special_requests.title: Special Requests or Comments
special_requests.description: Please enter any special requests, questions, or comments you have regarding your registration

referral_source.title: How Did You Hear About Us?
referral_source.description: Please let us know how you heard about this course or program

other_referral.title: Other Referral Source
other_referral.description: If you selected 'Other', please specify how you heard about us

electronic_signature.title: Electronic Signature
electronic_signature.description: Please type your full name as your electronic signature

thank_you.title: Thank You!
thank_you.description: Thank you for submitting your course registration. You will receive a confirmation email shortly with details about your registration. If you have any questions, please contact our registration office.
